statements: DELETE FROM inventory WHERE product_name = 'Product A';
DELETE FROM inventory WHERE product_id = 101 AND quantity < 10;
DELETE FROM inventory WHERE product_name LIKE '%iphone%' AND quantity = 0;
DELETE FROM products WHERE product_id = 101 AND stock_quantity <= 10
DELETE FROM orders WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe' AND order_date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM products WHERE price > 1000 AND stock_quantity < 10;
DELETE FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NULL;
DELETE FROM inventory WHERE product_id = (SELECT product_id FROM products WHERE product_name = 'example_product');
DELETE FROM inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse' AND quantity <= 10;
DELETE FROM customer WHERE id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM order WHERE status = 'cancelled');
